dash.description:
## Take Home Assignment - Visualizing Data

This dashboard shows the following graphs:

- A custom metric (my_metric) scoped over the host
- The avg mongodb.stats.objects over everything with the anomaly function applied.

I used the following docs to create this dashboard:

- [Writing a Custom Agent Check](https://docs.datadoghq.com/developers/write_agent_check/?tab=agentv6v7)
- [Dashboards API reference article](https://docs.datadoghq.com/api/v1/dashboards/)
- [MongoDB Integration](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/mongo/)
dash.title: Visualizing Data - test
